messages.subject: PARTY  IN  THE  WOODS
messages.msgSnippet: ITS ON The first two week of May are open house in the woods at our house for UNSCHOOLERS CAMP OUT. There is the pristine St. Mary s river (fishing,
messages.messageBody:
ITS ON

The first two week of May are "open house in the
woods" at our house for UNSCHOOLERS CAMP OUT.

There is the pristine St. Mary's river (fishing,
swimming, canoeing). 29 acres of woods (camping
hiking). Indoor plumbing and aerated, filtered
drinking water(we have a kitchen, also). Amelia
Island (beach, state park (Ft. Clinch)is 40 minutes
away. Jacksonville Zoo is 40 minutes away.
Okeefeenokee Swamp (museum, boardwalk, boat rides) is
20 minutes away.

The Florida Folk Festival is 1 hour away the second
weekend in May.

I will make pancakes for breakfast, daily, and keep a
pot of pinto-bean chili and fresh bread handy.

E off list for directions from I95 near the Georgia
line in Florida!!

bearspawprint@...

Hope lots of you can come. Bring camping gear, canoe,
fishing gear (if you want to), music, shoes, bug
repellant.

PARTY IN THE WOODS

__________________________________________________

messages.subject: Visit from 4 Brits
messages.msgSnippet: ... If you make it as far as Southern California we would love to have a visit from 4 brits. We are in the San Gabriel valley of the Los Angeles basin.  Near
messages.messageBody:
On Wed, 20 Mar 2002 10:04:15 -0500 Shyrley <shyrley@...> writes:
> Ho hum. We're going away for 3 months this summer. Without DH. As I
> can't afford
> to fly home. I'm chucking the tent in the car and heading out into
> the US to see
> how far I get.
> Anyone want a visit from 4 brits?
>
> Shyrley

If you make it as far as Southern California we would love to have a visit
from 4 brits.
We are in the San Gabriel valley of the Los Angeles basin. Near where
Interstate 10 and California 57 meet, about 20 miles east of LA.

-Dan (and Jocelyn and Matthew) Vilter
